title: Two Powerful Earthquakes Hit Cuba Within An Hour
content: A second, more powerful quake rocked southern Cuba on Sunday, US geologists said, shortly after a first shallow tremor that did not prompt a tsunami alert.
summary: A second, more powerful quake rocked southern Cuba on Sunday, US geologists said, shortly after a first shallow tremor that did not prompt a tsunami alert.

title: Netanyahu Confirms He Okayed Pager Attacks That Killed Nearly 40 In Lebanon
content: Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday accepted that he had "okayed" the pager attacks in Lebanon, which had killed nearly 40 Iran-backed Hezbollah members in September.
summary: Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday accepted that he had "okayed" the pager attacks in Lebanon, which had killed nearly 40 Iran-backed Hezbollah members in September.

title: Bitcoin Hits $80,000 For First Time As Trump Set To Return To White House
content: Bitcoin soared to a new record high on Sunday, as traders bet that Donald Trump's return to the White House will be good for the cryptocurrency.
summary: Bitcoin soared to a new record high on Sunday, as traders bet that Donald Trump's return to the White House will be good for the cryptocurrency.

title: "I Live In Hope": A Channel Nightmare Survivor's Search For Missing Father
content: Osama Ahmed's life took a dramatic turn one night in October when the small boat that was to carry him and his father to the English coast sank shortly after setting out from France.
summary: Osama Ahmed's life took a dramatic turn one night in October when the small boat that was to carry him and his father to the English coast sank shortly after setting out from France.

title: Adani-JKH Terminal At Colombo Port Likely To Be Operational From Q1 2025
content: The first cargo ship is likely to reach Sri Lanka's Adani-John Keells Holding (JKH) West Container Terminal (WCT) in Colombo Port in the first quarter of 2025, Srilankan news website The Morning Online reported.
summary: The first cargo ship is likely to reach Sri Lanka's Adani-John Keells Holding (JKH) West Container Terminal (WCT) in Colombo Port in the first quarter of 2025, Srilankan news website The Morning Online reported.

title: Video: Nvidia's Jensen Huang Reveals Why He Doesn't Wear A Watch
content: Mr Huang, whose company Nvidia has seen its valuation skyrocket in recent years, emphasized the value of living in the moment.

title: Russia Sees "Positive Signs" On Donald Trump's Position On Ukraine
content: The Kremlin said Sunday that it saw "positive signals" from US president-elect Donald Trump's position on Ukraine.
summary: The Kremlin said Sunday that it saw "positive signals" from US president-elect Donald Trump's position on Ukraine.

content: In August, it announced plans to reduce its workforce by 15,000 through voluntary separations and layoffs.

title: US Couple Kills Each Other While Son Plays Video Game In Another Room

title: 1,500 Russian Troops Killed Or Injured Every Day In October In Ukraine: UK
content: Russian troops recently suffered their worst month for casualties since the country's war with Ukraine began almost three years ago, the head of Britain's armed forces said on Sunday.
summary: Russian troops recently suffered their worst month for casualties since the country's war with Ukraine began almost three years ago, the head of Britain's armed forces said on Sunday.

title: Russian Forces Capture New Village In Ukraine's Donetsk Amid Raging War
content: The Russian defence ministry said Sunday that its forces had captured a new village in Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region.
summary: The Russian defence ministry said Sunday that its forces had captured a new village in Ukraine's eastern Donetsk region.

title: Violence Outside Sheikh Hasina Party Office After Rally Call, Dhaka Tense
content: Bangladesh's capital Dhaka remains tense on Sunday as several Awami League supporters were reportedly beaten following the party's decision to hold a protest march at Shaheed Noor Hossain Square in commemoration of Noor Hossain Day.
summary: Bangladesh's capital Dhaka remains tense on Sunday as several Awami League supporters were reportedly beaten following the party's decision to hold a protest march at Shaheed Noor Hossain Square in commemoration of Noor Hossain Day.

title: Trump's China Policies To Benefit India, Asian Countries: Ratings Agency
content: With Donald Trump set to become the next US president after the recently closely contested presidential polls, India and other Asian countries are expected to benefit due to rising US-China tensions and potential investment restrictions.
summary: With Donald Trump set to become the next US president after the recently closely contested presidential polls, India and other Asian countries are expected to benefit due to rising US-China tensions and potential investment restrictions.

title: Canada Cops Arrest Banned Group's Member Over Hindu Temple Attack
content: Canadian police have arrested a 35-year-old Brampton resident on charges of assault with a weapon during a violent demonstration at a Hindu temple in the city, authorities said.
summary: Canadian police have arrested a 35-year-old Brampton resident on charges of assault with a weapon during a violent demonstration at a Hindu temple in the city, authorities said.

title: In A First, Taliban Officials To Attend UN Climate Conference: Report
content: Afghan Taliban officials will attend a major United Nations climate conference that starts next week, the Afghan Foreign Ministry said on Sunday, the first time they have attended since the former insurgents took power in 2021.
summary: Afghan Taliban officials will attend a major United Nations climate conference that starts next week, the Afghan Foreign Ministry said on Sunday, the first time they have attended since the former insurgents took power in 2021.

title: This Will Be Trump's Likely Salary After He Takes Over As US President
content: The US President is one of the most highly influential persons around the world, receiving a substantial financial package accompanied by multiple allowances and lifetime benefits.

title: 10 Dead, 7 Injured As Gunmen Open Fire At Mexico Bar
content: The attackers arrived in a pickup truck and opened fire inside the bar in the central Mexican city of Queretaro.

title: Moscow Airports Shut, 1 Injured After Ukraine's Biggest-Ever Drone Attack

title: American Youtuber Kisses Korean Wartime Memorial Statue. Then This Happens
